EmailTemplate.description: Case Line Item Completion Notification - INC000006283200
EmailTemplate.name: Case Line Item Completion Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Case_Line_Item__c.Case_Number__c} - {!Case_Line_Item__c.Case_Subject__c} Quote Update
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.Name},
Your quote has been updated on the portal for the part number shown below. Please go to myaerospace.com to view the pricing for: {!Case_Line_Item__c.Product_Description__c}
You will have the option to place your order for this part number only or to wait until your entire request for quote has been completed.
Thank you, The Honeywell Aerospace Service & Support Team
